mapper.sql: t.uuid uuid, t.yabh yabh, t.yasxh yasxh, t.yabbh yabbh, t.yalx yalx, t.yamc yamc, t.yajb yajb, t.dxid dxid, t.dxmc dxmc, t.bwid bwid, t.bwmc bwmc, t.sfkqy sfkqy, t.jgid jgid, t.jgbm jgbm, t.jgmc jgmc, t.zzrid zzrid, t.zzrmc zzrmc, TO_CHAR(t.zzsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') zzsj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS pkid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_BWJW(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalx,yamc,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yalx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zzsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_BWJW t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_BWJW(uuid,yabh,yasxh,yabbh,yalx,yamc,yajb,dxid,dxmc,bwid,bwmc,sfkqy,jgid,jgbm,jgmc,zzrid,zzrmc,zzsj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.uuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} uuid,#{item.yabh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabh,#{item.yasxh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yasxh,#{item.yabbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yabbh,#{item.yalx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yalx,#{item.yamc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yamc,#{item.yajb,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yajb,#{item.dxid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxid,#{item.dxmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} dxmc,#{item.bwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwid,#{item.bwmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bwmc,#{item.sfkqy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} sfkqy,#{item.jgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgid,#{item.jgbm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgbm,#{item.jgmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jgmc,#{item.zzrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrid,#{item.zzrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zzrmc,#{item.zzsj,jdbcType=DATE} zzsj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE uuid = VALUES(uuid), yabh = VALUES(yabh), yasxh = VALUES(yasxh), yabbh = VALUES(yabbh), yalx = VALUES(yalx), yamc = VALUES(yamc), yajb = VALUES(yajb), dxid = VALUES(dxid), dxmc = VALUES(dxmc), bwid = VALUES(bwid), bwmc = VALUES(bwmc), sfkqy = VALUES(sfkqy), jgid = VALUES(jgid), jgbm = VALUES(jgbm), jgmc = VALUES(jgmc), zzrid = VALUES(zzrid), zzrmc = VALUES(zzrmc), zzsj = VALUES(zzsj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_BWJW t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
and t.yamc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{yamc}),'%')
and t.dxmc LIKE concat(concat('%',#{dxmc}),'%')
and t.yalx LIKE concat(rtrim(#{yalx},'0'),'%')
and t.sfkqy = #{sfkqy}
